ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.inventory

Class UserInventoryFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.inventory.UserInventoryFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, Observer

    public class UserInventoryFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
implements Observer
    Fragment that displays the User's Inventory in a ListView.

    By clicking the listed Items here the user can inspect, edit and delete. The User can add an item by pressing the FloatingActionButton.
